title: Corridor Southwest Ontario Northbound
heading: VIA Rail's Southwest Ontario services Northbound
bottom_text:
The Maple Leaf is operated jointly by VIA Rail and Amtrak. Local tickets within the US can be bought from Amtrak.

Appropriate documentation (passports, visas, vaccination cards, etc.) is required to cross the US-Canadian border; please check government websites for details.

Maple Leaf times differ slightly on weekends, but these times are not in VIA's GTFS data.
